column5: We went to open the trailer this weekend. Well we were greeted to unusually high and fast waters.    We did manage to get the boat launched. When fishing our usual crappie spot, we caught many crappie (kept 6)We did get some OOS fish that were all released they were bass and a Huge Walleye in the same spot as the crappies.   After a great day of mixed species I decided to use the old tried tested and true method of large sucker minnows and a bobber..Had a good day with lots of smaller pike. On the last minnow I managed get a big one to hit! I must admit I'm new to Pike fishing so this was my PB pike. Had a great weekend! Lots of fish and a huge crappie feast! Does life get any better?        Thanks for looking folks!
verry nice  sh sh shh   NICE PIKE

Congrats on the PB Ron - looks like a great weekend . Cool measuring device too - all you needed was potato and you had a naked supper ! Looks like it took a while to get home and unpacked from the time you posted?  (PS - I should be around tonight if you want to stop by for the rod holders -then maybe your can straighten out the one you were using in the pictures? )
Some good fishing and nice scenery. It must of been nice to just get back out there....but "Coors Light"....well I guess no one's perfect...
Upside down crappies kissing a Coors light...  Looks like a blast out there and that's is a nice pb pike!!
I think the crappies died from drinking the Coors Light...
Nice fish, would be great if you had some beer to go with them.  (ducks low and scurries for cover...)
Funny stuff guys! I thought you would get a kick out of the beer..As for the coors light thats what was in Mama's hand at that time...lol. We had a great weekend and thanks for the positive comments!
Dude, the mountains are blue, hurry up and drink it!!   Nice Crappies!
haha I'm no stranger to Coors Light buddy! Nice slabs and thanks for the post!
Great report!  Thanks for sharing.  Congrats on the PB!
Nicely done tb4me Nice gator   Congrats on your PB
Excellent report.  Wow, that water really is high and fast.  Those crappie look dang tasty too.  Congrats on the PB     She's a beaut!
